content: the **corner-to-corner c2c waffle baby blanket** is a textured and soft blanket that is perfect for both baby boys and girls the body of the blanket is crocheted using the c2c waffle stitch the border uses the moss stitch the pattern is written for a baby blanket but the size of the blanket is easily customizable this pattern comes with step-by-step photos and a video tutorial that you can find ** here 1 ** *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 4 5-mm g/7 us 7 uk crochet hook dk 3 light yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used 1744 yds 1595 m 550 g of james c brett super soft baby dk 317 yds / 290 m per 100 g in soft grey 11 feel free to use any comparable yarn that meets gauge **size** 35 5 90 cm by 40 102 cm **gauge** 17 sts for 11 row in 4 10 cm working the c2c waffle stitch **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=3doprlaczn0
